prompts: Create a unique Pokemon that can transform into any shape with a playful personality.
Imagine an amorphous Pokemon that can blend into its surroundings effortlessly.
Show me a Pokemon that can change its appearance and is often underestimated in battles.
Design a Pokemon that loves to mimic other creatures and is known for its adaptability.
Generate a character that can take on the form of any Pokemon it sees.
Make a cute Pokemon that is often found in urban areas and loves to play tricks.
Give me a Pokemon with a fluid shape that can fit into tight spaces easily.

distinctive_features: Simple face with small eyes and mouth
Ability to transform into other Pokemon
